articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: Plane makes successful wheels-up emergency landing in Australia after circling airport for hours - CNN
articles.description: Two passengers and a pilot emerged unscathed from a small plane after it was forced to land without landing gear following a mechanical failure at Newcastle Airport in Australia’s New South Wales.
articles.content:
